propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.expandIcon: O ícone para exibir como o indicador de expansão.
propDescriptions.focusVisibleClassName: This prop can help identify which element has keyboard focus. The class name will be applied when the element gains the focus through keyboard interaction. It's a polyfill for the CSS :focus-visible selector. The rationale for using this feature is explained here. A polyfill can be used to apply a focus-visible class to other components if needed.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

expanded.conditions: elemento filho encapsulador e componente IconButton se expanded={true}

focusVisible.conditions: o botão está focado no teclado
